title: I purchased $100 instead of $10 ðŸ”§
body:
Okay so today was like everyother day, instead this day i wanted to buy a skin, so i jumped on store and went to ADD RP and at this point  i am more then certein i clicked $10 RP but obviously i didnt so now i have over 100 dollars RP on my account that i didnt mean to spend.

Does RIOT refund this if its accidental?

I have the Trans ID and time from the Email i got after accidentally purchasing this.

EDIT: I have sent a ticket but i just wanted to see quickly if anyone else had this problem.

replies.body: Hey there! I think that Riot Support should be able to accommodate your request for a refund, but the folks handling your ticket will be the ones who have more context on your situation. If you have any issues, don't hesitate to reach out!
